DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess sensibility ISL questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: ED patient must : Be male , 18 year age upper age limit ; Have document clinical diagnosis erectile dysfunction confirm Erectile Function ( IIEF ) score 25 . Erectile dysfunction define `` inability achieve and/or maintain erection penis sufficient permit satisfactory sexual performance '' ( ImpotenceNIH Consensus Conference , JAMA 1993 , 270 : 8390 ) ; Have stable female partner least 6 month prior screen . Have know hypersensitivity sildenafil component study medication ; medical history treatmentrelated intolerable side effect sildenafil Be currently prescribe , take and/or likely treat nitrate nitric oxide donor form either regular intermittent basis .
